definition: the Ural mountains in Russia, dividing Europe from Asia
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
the Ural mountains in Russia, dividing Europe from Asia

sentences.english: The results show that Ural is the most preferred area for blocking occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，阻高主要發生在烏拉爾山地區。

sentences.english: The Volga River and the Ural River discharge into the Caspian Sea.
sentences.chinese: 伏爾加河以及烏拉爾河都有流入裏海。

sentences.english: And whether their society is of slave nature still remains a doubt.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉爾圖社會是否屬於奴隸社會仍然是個疑問。

sentences.english: It covered all of Europe, from the Atlantic to the Urals.
sentences.chinese: 它覆蓋了整個歐洲，從大西洋直至烏拉爾。

sentences.english: The more central Ural Mountains is a north-south range which divides Europe from Asia.
sentences.chinese: 更中心的烏拉爾山脈是區分歐亞大陸的西北面的山脈。

sentences.english: The road is one of the main arteries between Moscow and the Urals.
sentences.chinese: M5是連接莫斯科和烏拉爾的交通要道。

sentences.english: Many geographers say that the Ural Mountains form the dividing line between Europe and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 許多地理學家認爲，烏拉爾山脈是歐亞兩洲的分界線。

sentences.english: Land to the east of the Urals is named Asia.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉爾山以東的陸地稱爲亞洲。

sentences.english: From the Atlantic Ocean to the Ural Mountains stretches the continent of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲大陸從大西洋一直綿延至烏拉爾山。

sentences.english: Now that Europe extends eastward toward the Urals.
sentences.chinese: 現在，歐洲已經東擴至烏拉爾山脈。

sentences.english: This is a serpentine road going through the Urals.
sentences.chinese: 這是一條蜿蜒的路穿過烏拉爾山。

sentences.english: It’s the Ural, one of the local means of transport.
sentences.chinese: 這是當地的一種交通工具，烏拉爾汽車。

sentences.english: Lor to the east of the Urals is titled Asia.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉爾山以東的陸地稱爲亞洲。

sentences.english: Land to the east of the Urals is titled Asia.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉爾山以東的陸地稱爲亞洲。

sentences.english: The Uralic language of this people.
sentences.chinese: 恩加納桑人說的烏拉爾語。

sentences.english: A case of the formation of blocking situation west of Ural is studied.
sentences.chinese: 所計算的是烏拉爾阻塞流型發展關鍵時刻的例子。
